scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../ml-service && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:ml"
scripts.build:prod: npm run build && cd backend && npm run build
scripts.test: concurrently "cd frontend && npm test" "cd backend && npm test"
scripts.lint: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run lint" "cd backend && npm run lint"
